column1: Result of an Examination into the State of Drainage of the Houses situate in the following Streets, in the Parish of St. James, Westminster, where so many Deaths from Cholera have taken place, as set forth in the Registrar-General's Returns for the Two Weeks ending the 2nd and 9th instant, but which does not include the Deaths that have taken place after removal from the Houses to the Hospitals, or those which occurred at the Workhouse.
